ENGINE = InnoDB;

-- Table `mydb`.`Account`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `mydb`.`Account` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`Account` (
  `idAccount` INT NOT NULL,
